EDITBOX.name: M3_Z1_P0_Shelf_Qty
EDITBOX.label: Shelf Qty and Required Distance:
EDITBOX.Info: Enter the qty of Shelves in the form of Ratio {Example: 1:1 means 1 shelf comes in middle,280mm:1 means shelf comes after 280mm from bottom of that particular zone}
